name: The New Sliker
description:
I'm an electrician by day, and I made this game in my spare time with Unreal Engine 4. I have no prior experience with game development, this is the first game I've ever published. Hopefully, there won't be any bugs. Everything worked fine on my pc. 

If you want to support me, you can make a donation here.

Contact: https://twitter.com/WazleeDev
